name: sliced in sauce
title: Gourmet Perle · sliced in sauce · chicken &beef, turkey &lamb, veal &duck, rabbit &game
description: Gourmet sliced in sauce chicken &beef, turkey &lamb, veal &duck, rabbit &game

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition: animal meats and by-products (20%, including rabbit 4%, game 4%), extracts from vegetable proteins, fish and fish by fish, mineral substances, sugars. Composition: animal meat and by-products (19%, including 4%calf, duck 4%), extracts from vegetable proteins, fish and fish by-products, mineral substances, sugars. Composition: animal meats and by-products (20%, including 4%turkey, lamb 4%), extracts from vegetable proteins, fish and fish by-products, mineral substances, sugars. Composition: animal meat and by-products (18%, including chicken 6%, beef 4%), extracts from vegetable proteins, fish and fish by fish, mineral substances, sugars.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives: Nutritional additives: IU/KG: LIVE A: 700; Vit D3: 105; MG/KG: Iron sulfate (II) Monohydrate: (Fe: 8.0); Anhydrous calcium iodate: (I: 0.20); Copper sulfate (II) Pentahydrate: (Cu: 0.7); Monohydrated manganeous sulfate: (Mn: 1.5); Sulfate of Zinc Monohydrate: (Zn: 14.5); Taurine: 440. Aromas.

usageInformation.usage: Your cat is a true gourmet and especially loves taste experiences with meat? For this reason GOURMET has created Pearl Duetto di Carne. The delicate pleasure combinations will appeal to your cat's senses in an irresistible way every day.  Duetto di Carne combines selected strips with meat cut into fine fillets and gently cooked in a tasty sauce.  Duetto di Carne by GOURMET Perle - the pleasure duet for meat lovers. Every day a unique taste experience for your velvet paw.

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide: for an adult cat of around 4 kg, give 3 to 4 sachets per day, preferably distributed in at least 2-3 meals. The recommended daily rations are calculated for an adult cat to moderate activity in normal environment and temperature conditions. Nutritional needs can vary depending on the cat, so it is necessary to adjust these rations in order to maintain it to its shape. Serve at room temperature. Always leave clean and fresh water available to your cat.

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complete pet food for adult cats
otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.

mainSpecificities.code: Food needs per day in bowls

mainSpecificities.value: Füttern Sie Ihrer ausgewachsenen Katze (4kg) 3 bis 4 Portionsbeutel pro Tag,  die auf mindestens 2 Mahlzeiten verteilt werden sollten. Diese Richtwerte basieren auf mässig aktiven Katzen bei normaler Umgebungstemperatur. Individuelle Bedürfnisse können variieren,  sodass die Futtermenge entsprechend angepasst werden sollte,  um ein schlankes,  gesundes Körpergewicht Ihrer Katze zu erhalten. Bitte zimmerwarm servieren. Sauberes,  frisches Wasser sollte stets zur Verfügung stehen.
